item.title: âœ… Last week's post
item.description:
Insanity is the exact repetition of the same action, over and over again, in the hope of a change.

Monday

On Monday, I took distance classes, then rested.

Tuesday

On Tuesday I attended classes at the institute, there was a matanalysis test, after the institute I was preparing for the Wednesday test and did not rest.

Wednesday

On Wednesday I attended classes at the institute, there was a test in mathematical logic. After college, I got ready for Thursday at home and had a rest.

Thursday

On Thursday, I attended classes at the institute, defended a laboratory paper on programming technology. After college, I got ready for Friday at home and had a rest.

Friday

On Friday I attended classes at the institute, there was a test in German and a monologue in English. I had a rest after college.

Saturday

On Saturday, I rested and prepared for the next difficult week.

Sunday

I did the same thing on Sunday as I did on Saturday.
